name: integrationist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who believes that different groups of people should be able to mix together more: She was an avid integrationist in the civil rights movement. The integrationists are opposed to national governments having the power of veto in these matters.
More examplesFewer examplesIntegrationists would like to see a greater role for the European Parliament.He was one of the first integrationists to be elected as a member of the Senate.
